t: Amazon Halo: a fitness band and app that scans your body, listens to your voice | The Verge
s: Amazon is creating an entirely new fitness band and health service, called Halo. The Halo Band is a simple gadget with no display, but the Halo app is more interesting. It can use your camera to create a 3D scan of your body and calculate your body fat. It also listens to the tone of your voice.

Amazon in January announced that it would lay off 18,000 employees, and in March moved to shed an additional 9,000 workers.
